mapper.insert: insert into member (id, username, birth_date, password, gender, u_tel, email, created_at, user_type, nickname, u_address, diary_private, warning_count, state_code) values(#{id}, #{username}, #{birthDate}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{uTel}, #{email}, NOW() , 'USER' , #{nickname}, #{uAddress}, #{diaryPrivate}, 0, 1)
